member.summary: Withdraw funds from Bitfinex, either to a crypto currency address or a bank account All withdrawals need the withdrawType, wallet and quantity parameters CryptoCurrency withdrawals need the address parameters, the paymentId can be used for Monero as payment id and for Ripple as tag Wire withdrawals need the bank parameters. In some cases your bank will require the use of an intermediary bank, if this is the case, please supply those fields as well.
member.param: The type of funds to withdraw
The SWIFT code of the bank
Whether it is an express wire withdrawal
